column5: Anyone know how the fishing is on Calander Bay and what they're using? We're headin to Sunset Cove this weekend.

Whatever you do, don't call Sunset Cove to find out!  Doesn't it seem that when the fishing is lousy, Lodge owners will always tell you how well the guys did the week before.  Just once I want to be that guy the week before!
Easy - Just go 2 weeks in a row - lol       Don

that's funny , but sadly all too true. just like the one that got away .sometimes hearing that though makes or breaks getting you  out for the day if you were on the fence . it's always better than the couch.

Stayed at Sunset. Nice cottages. Nice huts. Good fishing. You can use what ever you like. Simple dead line minnow or jig head and minnow. Spoons. It all has it's place and time. Pimples,Hawger and  even jigging raps. You name it. Everyone has their favourite. I use a 2" Williams in copper but silver with glow works as well.
See what I mean...Oh Ya.  ..Try Plastics....
